story_summary: Mihail Makarovitch Makarov, the police captain, hosts a social gathering where many key town figures are present. During the evening, news arrives that Fyodor Pavlovitch has been murdered in his home, and witnesses find Grigory injured nearby. An inquiry begins immediately, and authorities prepare to pursue the suspect, Dmitri Fyodorovitch, who is believed to be planning suicide.
evidence_quotes: old Fyodor Pavlovitch really had been murdered that evening
It was resolved to act with energy
